update OrderChild
OrderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ChildId = #{childid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TotalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GoodPrice = #{goodprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DeliveryPrice = #{deliveryprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PayStyle = #{paystyle,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PayType = #{paytype,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PayStatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PayBy = #{payby,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
PayTime = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

UpdateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update OrderChild set OrderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ChildId = #{childid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TotalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GoodPrice = #{goodprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DeliveryPrice = #{deliveryprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PayStyle = #{paystyle,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PayType = #{paytype,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PayStatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PayBy = #{payby,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, PayTime = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PayPrice = #{payprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HasUploadTicket = #{hasuploadticket,jdbcType=BIT}, TicketUrl = #{ticketurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateBy = #{createby,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OriginalOrderNo = #{originalorderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WxCodeUrl = #{wxcodeurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ThirdPayStatus = #{thirdpaystatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select oc.Id ,oc.OrderId ,oc.ChildId ,oc.TotalPrice ,oc.GoodPrice ,oc.DeliveryPrice ,oc.PayStyle , oc.PayType ,oc.PayStatus , oc.PayBy , oc.PayTime ,oc.PayPrice ,oc.HasUploadTicket , oc.TicketUrl ,oc.CreateBy ,oc.CreateTime ,oc.UpdateBy ,oc.UpdateTime from dbo.OrderChild oc ( nolock ) join dbo.[order] (nolock)o on oc.OrderId=o.Id where o.OrderNo=#{OrderNo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} and o.businessId=#{BusinessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
